org.jtrim.swing.component

Interface TransformationStepPos


  • public interface TransformationStepPos
    Defines a reference which might be used to add a new transformation step before or after a TransformationStepDef.

    Instances of this interface are associated with a TransformationStepDef and so may only be used while the associated TransformationStepDef is not removed.

    Since TransformationStepPos instances are associated with a TransformedImageDisplay (because they are associated with a TransformationStepDef, its method may only be called from the the AWT Event Dispatch Thread.

    See Also:
    TransformationStepDef

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TransformationStepDef addAfter()
      Adds a new TransformationStepDef to apply after the TransformationStepDef associated with this TransformationStepPos.
      TransformationStepDef addBefore()
      Adds a new TransformationStepDef to apply before the TransformationStepDef associated with this TransformationStepPos.

    • Method Detail

      • addBefore

        TransformationStepDef addBefore()
        Adds a new TransformationStepDef to apply before the TransformationStepDef associated with this TransformationStepPos.

        This method may not be called after the associated TransformationStepDef was removed.

        Returns:
        a new TransformationStepDef to apply before the TransformationStepDef associated with this TransformationStepPos. This method may never return null.

      • addAfter

        TransformationStepDef addAfter()
        Adds a new TransformationStepDef to apply after the TransformationStepDef associated with this TransformationStepPos.

        This method may not be called after the associated TransformationStepDef was removed.

        Returns:
        a new TransformationStepDef to apply after the TransformationStepDef associated with this TransformationStepPos. This method may never return null.
